alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:41PM CDT until April 03 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Heavy rain yesterday is resulting in rises on the Ohio River. The river is forecast to go over flood stage for portions of the Lower Ohio including Olmsted and Cairo. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO MONDAY, APRIL 03... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Monday, April 03. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday evening to a crest of 38.5 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday, April 03. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
